5.Name: fade_out
5.Description: Fades the top and bottom screen out to black.

11.Name: draw_image_bottom
11.Description: Draws an image on the bottom screen.

Parameters.Name: file
Parameters.Description: The file name of the image to load from '/data/bg/*.arc'.

Parameters.Name: unk
Parameters.Description: Unkown

12.Name: draw_image_top
12.Description: Draws an image on the top screen.

Parameters.Name: file
Parameters.Description: The file name of the image to load from '/data/bg/*.arc'.

Parameters.Name: unk
Parameters.Description: Unkown

15.Name: fade_in
15.Description: Fades the top and bottom screen in from black.

34.Name: set_room_movevment
34.Description: Sets up a movement to another 'room'.

Parameters.Name: arrowId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the arrow to show from 'data/ani/exit_[id].arc'.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Description: The x position of the movement arrow.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Description: The y position of the movement arrow.

Parameters.Name: unk1
Parameters.Description: Unknown

Parameters.Name: unk2
Parameters.Description: Unknown

Parameters.Name: roomId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the 'room' to move to.

Parameters.Name: unk3
Parameters.Description: Unknown

Parameters.Name: unk4
Parameters.Description: Unknown

67.Name: set_room_text
67.Description: Sets up an area in a 'room' that triggers descriptive text.

Parameters.Name: speakerId
Parameters.Description:
The ID of the speaker icon on the descriptive text.
Loads icon animation from '/data/ani/room_tobjp.arc'.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Description: The x position of the area.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Description: The y position of the area.

Parameters.Name: width
Parameters.Description: The width of the area.

Parameters.Name: height
Parameters.Description: The height of the area.

Parameters.Name: textId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the text to show from tobj.pcm in the format 't_[id].txt'.

Parameters.Name: unk
Parameters.Description: Unknown

80.Name: set_room_event_object
80.Description: Sets up event objects in a 'room'.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Description: The x position of the object and event trigger.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Description: The y position of the object and event trigger.

Parameters.Name: width
Parameters.Description: The width of the event trigger. Object width is derived from the animation.

Parameters.Name: height
Parameters.Description: The height of the event trigger. Object height is derived from the animation.

Parameters.Name: objectId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the object to show from '/data/ani/obj_[id].arc'.

Parameters.Name: eventId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the event to execute from '/data/script/event/e[id].gds'.

90.Name: set_room_map
90.Description: Sets up the map view in a 'room' on the top screen.

Parameters.Name: mapTextId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the map name to show from storytext.pcm in the format 'map[id].txt'.

Parameters.Name: mapId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the map to show from '/data/bg/map_[id].arc'.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Description: The x position of the character icon.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Description: The y position of the character icon.

Parameters.Name: unk3
Parameters.Description: Unknown

92.Name: set_room_animation
92.Description: Sets up an animation in a 'room' that plays as part of the environment.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Description: The x position of the animation.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Description: The y position of the animation.

Parameters.Name: file
Parameters.Description:
The file name of the animations to load from '/data/ani/*.arc'.
Plays the 'gfx' animation in the file.

104.Name: set_room_hint_coin
104.Description: Sets a hint coin in a 'room'.

Parameters.Name: coinId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the coin in the 'room'.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Description: The x position of the hint coin area.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Description: The y position of the hint coin area.

Parameters.Name: width
Parameters.Description: The width of the hint coin area.

Parameters.Name: height
Parameters.Description: The height of the hint coin area.

Parameters.Name: unk1
Parameters.Description: Unknown

186.Name: set_puzzle_name
186.Description: Sets the name of a puzzle.

Parameters.Name: puzzleId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the puzzle.

Parameters.Name: name
Parameters.Description: The name of the puzzle.

195.Name: set_puzzle_picarat
195.Description: Sets the picarat of a puzzle.

Parameters.Name: puzzleId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the puzzle.

Parameters.Name: maxPicarat
Parameters.Description: The maximum picarat earnable by the puzzle.

Parameters.Name: picaratFailure1
Parameters.Description: The picarat earnable by the puzzle after the first failure.

Parameters.Name: picaratFailure2
Parameters.Description: The picarat earnable by the puzzle after the second failure.

220.Name: set_puzzle_info
220.Description: Sets the type and location of a puzzle.

Parameters.Name: puzzleId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the puzzle.

Parameters.Name: type
Parameters.Description: The type of puzzle.

Parameters.Name: location
Parameters.Description: The location the puzzle is encountered.
